snippet: Felix Hernandez, the rare elite talent who chose small-market Seattle over Los Angeles or New York, will either be rewarded for his patience or doomed to waste his prime outside the playoffs.
abstract: Profile of Seattle Mariners pitcher Felix Hernandez, rare elite talent who chose to stay with small-market Seattle over Los Angeles or New York; Hernandez has more than 100 wins, a perfect game and Cy Young Award, but has never pitched in the postseason.
lead_paragraph: Felix Hernandez, the rare elite talent who chose small-market Seattle over Los Angeles or New York, will either be rewarded for his patience or doomed to waste his prime outside the playoffs.

headline.seo: Mariners’ Felix Hernandez, the Star Who Stayed
headline.main: A Star Who Jumped at the Chance to Stay
headline.print_headline: A Star Who Jumped at the Chance to Stay
